definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: The positive self-concept will promote the individual mental health.
sentences.chinese: 積極的自我概念會促進個體的心理健康。

sentences.english: Independent, self-motivated, enthusiasm and well organized with analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 獨立，自我激勵，積極性和良好的分析能力，組織。

sentences.english: That’s how negative people could drain your positive energy.
sentences.chinese: 這就是消極的人如何打消掉你的積極性了。

sentences.english: Tens of thousands of flag-waving activists called for early elections.
sentences.chinese: 數以萬計揮舞着國旗的積極分子要求提早進行選舉。

sentences.english: As a result, it is not necessary to maintain a positive ketosis test long term.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，就沒有必要堅持長期測試積極酮症了。

sentences.english: People in Beijing love orts and take an active part in orts.
sentences.chinese: 北京人愛好體育並積極參加體育活動。

sentences.english: Broaden and build leads to positive emotions.
And those same people post to the positive articles, too, and call everyone fanboys.
sentences.chinese: 那些發佈積極文章的人們，叫每個人粉絲。

sentences.english: But essentially research that falls under or within the field of positive psychology.
sentences.chinese: 但本質上屬於積極心理學範疇。

sentences.english: We will energetically develop venture capitalinvestment.
sentences.chinese: 積極發展創業風險投資。

sentences.english: Independent, enthusiastic, self-initiating, self-motivated & able to perform under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 獨立，態度積極，自發與能在壓力下執行任務。

sentences.english: In Chapter four, predict the positive effects of purchasing-house-for-pension by joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，預測了推行合資購房養老的積極效應。

sentences.english: Therefore, he facilitates IBM and the software company positively achieves a series of agreements.
sentences.chinese: 因而，他積極促成IBM與軟件公司告竣一系列協議。
幸福伴侶總是強調積極的一面。

sentences.english: Pro-active risk management increases the chance of project success.
sentences.chinese: 積極的風險管理增加了項目成功的機會。

sentences.english: It is because of this kind of optimistic, not afraid difficulty mentality.
sentences.chinese: 正是由於這種樂觀積極，不懼困難的心態。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
